products.title: Origin, Brown - Day Night Blind
products.description: The origin brown consists of a milky coffee-toned fabric, smooth with just the faintest of textures, and similarly shaded threading through a translucent netting. Brackets and controls are hidden neatly away in the overhead rail cassette, yet are easily accessible as needed. Team the brown with a rich burnt orange for a cosy, autumnal colour scheme in a dining room or living room. Choose dark, polished furniture to complement the look, and accent with plush fabrics, such as thick wools and smooth chenilles, for warmth and charm.

products.title: Origin, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: Classically elegant, the origin in old walnut displays a dark-toned finish on the responsibly sourced basswood typical of this range. A heavy duty headrail is specially designed to hold the weight of the wood and all components are formed from high quality materials. Mix the traditional with the contemporary by including the old walnut in a modernly styled dining room, blending with pale sage walls and white trim.

products.title: Nile Taped Walnut Real Wood
products.description: The nile taped range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different stat widths so will suit any window in your home. The matching cotton tape adds an extra feel of luxury. This dark wood taped blind will look great in rooms with a warm colour scheme or as a contrast to lighter coloured walls. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. With over fifty years experience in manufacturing and selling blinds in the uk, their wooden blinds are made by their expert team, and packed and shipped to your doorstep.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Latte - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a window covering with delectable shading and contemporary style, elect the modest roma (fr) in latte, which hosts a creamy, coffee shade on an ample, crease-free cloth. With modern effect and graceful elegance, this classy fabric sits in adaptable slats that allow you to manually regulate the amount of light and breeze entering the room. Fashion a sophisticated living space by coordinating the latte with a flattering cream surrounding, adding accenting colour with plenty of coffee-toned fabrics and conker-hued furnishings.

products.title: Amor Coffee With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. Amor coffee with haze pure double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor pure and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds.

products.title: Kolsva, Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an elegant window covering with value, choose the kolsva tawny oak with its high quality standard and sustainably sourced timber. The authentic louvres and modern components allow you to create a sophisticated style, with the added practicality of ventilation and shading flexibilities. Fashion a vibrant and inspired tribal theme in your lounge by hanging the tawny oak against a burnt orange backing, with opposing cream.

products.title: Kolsva, Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kolsva pale oak brings a touch of the natural world inside your home in a truly timeless way. With the gentle ebb and flow of the grain set against a warm and cosy shade you'll be able to sit back and relax as you appreciate the finer things in life. Turning the guest bedroom into the home away from home that your guests will never want to leave is all about adding those homely touches that put them at ease.

products.title: Hazel Perfect Fit
products.description: A dark brown shade, the hazel25mm perfect fit blind willbe the final part of your interior jigsaw. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.description: The origin (blackout) in coffee is indeed a deep coffee shade of brown, and forms an effective blackout blind with its durable, opaque fabric. products.title: Infusion Asc Coffee Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc coffee perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.
